summary: An automatic out-of-office email reply from a US Attorney's Office contractor regarding Maxwell/Epstein phone tip/hotline reports, indicating the recipient is unavailable with intermittent email access.

persons.name: Contractor
persons.context: The sender of the out-of-office email reply, identified as a contractor for the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), who is unavailable to respond to messages about Maxwell/Epstein phone tip/hotline reports.

keyFacts: The email is an automatic out-of-office reply from a US Attorney's Office contractor.
The subject references 'Maxwell/Epstein phone tip/hotline reports', indicating ongoing public or investigative interest in the case as of August 2021.
The contractor notes intermittent access to email, suggesting potential remote work or travel during this period.
